argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srhmsubc.s | |- A. r e. S r e. Ring |
| 2 |  | srhmsubc.c | |- C = ( U i^i S ) |
| 3 |  | srhmsubcOLD.j | |- J = ( r e. C , s e. C |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat J ) = ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat J ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_srhmsubcOLD | |- ( U e. V -> J e. ( Subcat ` ( RingCatOLD ` U ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_subccat | |- ( U e. V -> ( ( RingCatOLD ` U ) |`cat J ) e. Cat ) |
